name: Time and Time Again
description:
Time and Time again is a game made by a small group for the Puerto Rico Gamejam 2015. As a time traveling, flying saucer riding little guy push down to blast enemy aliens and survive.

This is the game as it was in it's final stage, so it's missing some things like looping music in some of the stages that I could fix, but for now won't, because I'm giving you the game as it was when we showed it.

Special shout out to Coffee Bean Studios for being such sports about everything.
